mapper.update:
UPDATE OM_POSITION
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positionid = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
posicode = #{posicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
posiname = #{posiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
posilevel = #{posilevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manaposi = #{manaposi,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dutyid = #{dutyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
positionseq = #{positionseq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positype = #{positype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastupdate = #{lastupdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subcount = #{subcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE OM_POSITION
id = #{domain.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positionid = #{domain.positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
posicode = #{domain.posicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
posiname = #{domain.posiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

manaposi = #{domain.manaposi,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dutyid = #{domain.dutyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orgid = #{domain.orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
positionseq = #{domain.positionseq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positype = #{domain.positype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{domain.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastupdate = #{domain.lastupdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updator = #{domain.updator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startdate = #{domain.startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enddate = #{domain.enddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

${wc.condition}
